basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, orange red flowers
basic.color: Leaf color gray green, when sunny leaf edges turning to dark red

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, a short period of dormancy in summer, put in places with bright scattered light
maintenance.watering: Avoid water saturation, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce watering when in dormancy
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
